original_text: Then I saw the wicked buried. They used to go in and out of the holy place and were praised in the city where they had done such things. This also is vanity.
korean_text: 그런 후에 내가 본즉 악인들은 장사지낸 바 되어 거룩한 곳을 떠나 그들이 그렇게 행한 성읍 안에서 잊어버린 바 되었으니 이것도 헛되도다

sentences.original_text: Then I saw the wicked buried.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 내가 악인이 장사되는 것을 보았다.

sentences.original_text: They used to go in and out of the holy place
and were praised in the city
where they had done such things.
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳은 그들이 그런 일을 행한 곳이었다.
